products.name: UploadedTest
products.description: A 19th-century brass pocket watch once carried by a railway conductor; precision-crafted escapement and engraved case tell the story of early industrial timekeeping.

products.name: Porcelain Tea Set
products.description: A hand-painted porcelain tea set from the late 1800s, featuring floral motifs; tea drinking rituals became fashionable across classes during the era.

products.name: Antique Sextant
products.description: A brass sextant used for navigation at sea during the Age of Sail; instruments like this enabled long voyages and global trade expansion.

products.name: Edwardian Portrait Frame
products.description: A gilded Edwardian frame that once held a family portrait; frames of this style reflect late-Victorian decorative tastes and photography's rise.

products.name: Cast-Iron Boot Jack
products.description: A utilitarian cast-iron boot jack from a rural 19th-century household; simple tools like this reveal everyday life before mass convenience goods.

products.name: Leather-bound Atlas
products.description: A late-19th-century leather-bound atlas containing hand-drawn maps; atlases like this capture the contemporary understanding of geography and empire.

products.name: Phonograph Cylinder
products.description: An early phonograph cylinder used to play recorded sound at the dawn of recorded music; such cylinders preserve the voices and songs of their time.
